title: {Custom Type} Rotational Ambigram: INQCLAN
content:
Here's my newest custom type commission, INQCLAN, for a group of gamers over in the Netherlands:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021002425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/inqclan_5840.png)

PDF attached for closer views!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [INQCLAN.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021002425/http:/typophile.com/files/INQCLAN.pdf) | 61.5 KB |
| [INQCLAN\_noOL.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021002425/http:/typophile.com/files/INQCLAN_noOL.pdf) | 48.61 KB |
author: dave bailey

comments.content:
C and L are making problems at first look, maybe because it is a result of just rotating the Q.

Also why does N has that crossbar? Also you should lover N beneath baseline because it looks like it is over it.

Could you post version without outline?

..I think the "N" needs the crossbar because it is also the "A"... Could be smaller so that the end narrows instead of flaring out, though, so as to be less obtrusive when seen as part of "N"...?  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Ever since I chose to block pop-ups, my toaster's stopped working.
Yeah, because of its ambigram nature it should have that crossbar.
Ah, crap. I forgot about this post! I've uploaded a non-outline version for ya!
